info.name: GMB - GYM Membership API
info.description: Complete API collection for GYM Membership Backend. Includes authentication, user management, membership plans, subscriptions, payments, check-ins, classes, trainers, reports, and logs.

response.name: failed - email already exists
failed - validation error

request.description: Get new access token using refresh token

response.name: success

request.description: Get all available membership plans (public - no auth required)

response.name: success
response.body:
{
  "success": true,
  "data": [
    {
      "id": "plan_basic001",
      "name": "Basic Plan",
      "description": "Basic gym access",
      "duration": 30,
      "price": 200000,
      "features": ["Gym access", "Locker"],
      "maxCheckInsPerDay": 1,
      "isActive": true
    },
    {
      "id": "plan_premium002",
      "name": "Premium Plan",
      "description": "Full access to all facilities",
      "duration": 30,
      "price": 500000,
      "features": ["Full gym access", "Group classes", "Personal locker", "Sauna"],
      "maxCheckInsPerDay": 2,
      "isActive": true
    }
  ]
}

request.description: Get membership plan by ID (public - no auth required)

response.name: success

response.name: success
failed - already has active subscription

request.description: Manually trigger subscription expiration check (Admin only)
Process payment with Midtrans for a subscription. Returns snapToken, redirectUrl, and paymentId.

response.name: failed - already paid

request.description: Midtrans payment webhook callback. Use the midtransOrderId from the Process Payment response to test this endpoint.

response.name: failed - no active subscription
failed - max check-ins reached
failed - not checked in
success
success

body.raw:
{
  "name": "Morning Yoga",
  "description": "Start your day with relaxing yoga",
  "trainerId": "{{trainerId}}",
  "schedule": "2026-01-15T07:00:00.000Z",
  "duration": 60,
  "capacity": 20,
  "type": "yoga"
}
